books.author: by Jojo Moyes
books.description: A woman who has barely been beyond her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic.
books.name: ME BEFORE YOU

books.author: by David Lagercrantz
books.description: Mikael Blomkvist and Lisbeth Salander are back in this continuation of Steig Larsson's Millennium series.
books.name: THE GIRL IN THE SPIDER'S WEB

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: A mother and her daughter-in-law both leave unhappy marriages and take up with new men.
books.name: A GIRL'S GUIDE TO MOVING ON

books.author: by Lynsay Sands
books.description: Mary becomes embroiled in Dante's search for his twin after running him over with her R.V.
books.name: RUNAWAY VAMPIRE

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Rachel Hauck
books.description: With her own wedding approaching, Charlotte pieces together the history of a vintage gown she finds.
books.name: THE WEDDING DRESS

books.author: by Jeffrey Archer
books.description: The sixth and penultimate book of the Clifton Chronicles brings the Cliftons and the Barringtons into the 1970s.
books.name: COMETH THE HOUR

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Tess Gerritsen
books.description: The medical examiner Kat Novak fears that a serial killer is stalking the streets, and one of the town’s most prominent citizens is her chief suspect; previously published as "Peggy Sue Got Murdered."
books.name: GIRL MISSING

books.author: by Penelope Ward
books.description: A woman must share an inherited house with the man she dumped long ago.
books.name: ROOMHATE

books.author: by Joanne Fluke
books.description: The Lake Eden, Minn., baker Hannah Swensen is about to get married, but first she must solve the murder of a visiting celebrity chef. Recipes included.
books.name: WEDDING CAKE MURDER

books.author: by Lori Foster
books.description: Armie must balance his budding career as an M.M.A. fighter with his growing feelings for his best friend's sister.
books.name: FIGHTING DIRTY

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: The detective D.  D. Warren hunts for a missing woman who was kidnapped and abused as a student and may have become a vigilante.
books.name: FIND HER

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Fiona Barton
books.description: When a suspect in a missing-child case dies, reporters and the police think they’ll get the real story from his widow. They’re wrong.
books.name: THE WIDOW
